run_neo4j[source]

run_neo4j(version='4.3.2', run_on_set_ports=False, **kwargs)

Spin up a new neo4j in a docker instance if one is not already running. Set the ichordb default driver to point to this test database.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
container_name = 'mranderson_unittest_sandbox'
neo4j=run_neo4j(container_name=container_name)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
driver = db.make_driver(container=neo4j)
db.set_default_driver(driver)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
TESTCASE.assertTrue(start_fresh(driver=driver))
TESTCASE.assertEqual(create_totem(driver).nodes_created, 1)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
neo4j.stop()
{% endraw %}
